text:
This is a fix for #216, JSON content type has no charset.

> Guys. the application/json mimetype DOES NOT accept a charset parameter. Don't even bother. Don't.

via https://twitter.com/mitsuhiko/status/358155129553301504
title: JSON content type has no charset.
